input_args.instruction: 'Context: Gene HLA-B associates with Disease diffuse large B-cell lymphoma and Disease allergic rhinitis. \n\nQuestion: Out of the given list, which Gene is associated with diffuse large B-cell lymphoma and allergic rhinitis.
